title: List of all Androidwebsocket   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidwebsocket   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AndroidAsync
repoList.description: Asynchronous socket, http(s) (client+server) and websocket library for android. Based on nio, not threads.

repoList.name: websocket-android-phonegap
repoList.description: This is a Java library that implements Websockt API (Draft-75/76) for Android platform. Library uses java.nio.* packages for efficient non-blocking evented behavior. It easily gets integrated with Phonegap framework.

repoList.name: pusher-websocket-java
repoList.description: Pusher Channels client library for Java targeting general Java and Android

repoList.name: JavaWebsocketClient
repoList.description: RxJava WebSocket library for Java and Android

repoList.name: pusher-websocket-android
repoList.description: Library built on top of pusher-websocket-java for Android. Want Push Notifications? Check out Pusher Beams!

repoList.name: wasync
repoList.description: WebSockets with fallback transports client library for Node.js, Android and Java

repoList.name: centrifuge-java
repoList.description: General Java and Android Websocket client for Centrifugo server and Centrifuge library

repoList.name: android-websocket-client
repoList.description: Android Web Socket client library with test application and server

repoList.name: mqtt-websocket-jdk16-android
repoList.description: [UNMAINTAINED] MQTT over WebSocket library for JDK 1.6/Android with Paho and Jetty 8

repoList.name: android-stomp-websocket
repoList.description: Android STOMP client library via websocket connection
